message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is generous considering the circumstances.
I think we can find a more balanced split, Alice. Let's start with this and see if we can work something out.
Bob, my friend, let's not waste time. This offer is still better than what inflation will leave us with. Time is money!
Alice, we're getting closer. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a fair share as well.  Let's find a middle ground.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is more than fair. Take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
